name: Why did I Quit being a pilot?
name_original: Why did I Quit being a pilot?
description:
Made  for the I Can't Write Jam | Optional Theme: LOST

Please zoom in if screen is too small, or download the game below for proper full screen. Feel free to report any bugs to me in the comments!

How to play ?

Click or tap anywhere to advance the story, and on the buttons to make your choice.

How does this game relate to the optional theme ?

The game revolves around the theme of "memory loss" or "lost memories" where a grandfather tries to remember the reason for his unusual retirement, this is loosely inspired by the plot of Waltz with Bashir. There are also loss memes scattered around the game's background, if that counts.
